Name: Cutie Bear
About the game: Cutie Bear is a platformer game. Help the princess get home! On her way there will be terrible ghosts and monsters, but relying on her dexterity she will be able to overcome this difficult path. Collect hearts that will help to return to the checkpoint after a loss. The young princess is not so fragile, so jumping on the enemy can destroy him. Jumping over sharp thorns, overcoming rocks, dodging enemies, go this way. -Beautiful graphics -Dynamic gameplay -Beautiful music
